languages.text: "А значит, пришло время узнать, что творится с кабалом Опустошительной бури, обезглавленным и брошенным на поживу Комморре. Хм... выживших наверняка погонят в реальный мир, чтобы предать власти Сай'лантреш... {name}, ты долж{mf|ен|на} найти их. Если мы встретим остатки кабала в этом измерении — я хочу говорить с ними".

"And now it is time to learn what is happening with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, leaderless and abandoned to the mercies of Commorragh. Hmm... the survivors will probably be driven into realspace to fall prey to Sai'lanthresh... {name}, you must find them. If we encounter the remnants of the Kabal in this dimension, I will want to speak to them."
languages.original_text: "А значит, пришло время узнать, что творится с кабалом Опустошительной бури, обезглавленным и брошенным на поживу Комморре. Хм... выживших наверняка погонят в реальный мир, чтобы предать власти Сай'лантреш... {name}, ты долж{mf|ен|на} найти их. Если мы встретим остатки кабала в этом измерении — я хочу говорить с ними".

If we encounter the remnants of the Kabal in this dimension, I will want to speak to them."

traits.locale_text: "And now it is time to learn what is happening with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, leaderless and abandoned to the mercies of Commorragh. Hmm... the survivors will probably be driven into realspace to fall prey to Sai'lanthresh... {name}, you must find them. If we encounter the remnants of the Kabal in this dimension, I will want to speak to them."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Y ahora debo descubrir qué está pasando con la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora, decapitada y abandonada a la merced de Commorragh. Mmm... los supervivientes probablemente sean expulsados al espacio real para que sean presa de Sai'lanthresh... {name}, tienes que encontrarlos. Si encuentras a alguien de la Kábala en esta dimensión, quiero hablar con él».
languages.original_text: "And now it is time to learn what is happening with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, leaderless and abandoned to the mercies of Commorragh. Hmm... the survivors will probably be driven into realspace to fall prey to Sai'lanthresh... {name}, you must find them. If we encounter the remnants of the Kabal in this dimension, I will want to speak to them."

traits.locale_text: «Y ahora debo descubrir qué está pasando con la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora, decapitada y abandonada a la merced de Commorragh. Mmm... los supervivientes probablemente sean expulsados al espacio real para que sean presa de Sai'lanthresh... {name}, tienes que encontrarlos. Si encuentras a alguien de la Kábala en esta dimensión, quiero hablar con él».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “现在，是时候说说狂风阴谋团的情况了。他们群龙无首，在科摩罗中自生自灭。嗯……那些存活下来的人可能会被赶到真实世界，沦为赛·兰斯雷什的猎物……{name}，你必须找到他们。如果能在这片星域找到阴谋团的残党，我打算和他们谈谈。”
languages.original_text: "And now it is time to learn what is happening with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, leaderless and abandoned to the mercies of Commorragh. Hmm... the survivors will probably be driven into realspace to fall prey to Sai'lanthresh... {name}, you must find them. If we encounter the remnants of the Kabal in this dimension, I will want to speak to them."

traits.locale_text: “现在，是时候说说狂风阴谋团的情况了。他们群龙无首，在科摩罗中自生自灭。嗯……那些存活下来的人可能会被赶到真实世界，沦为赛·兰斯雷什的猎物……{name}，你必须找到他们。如果能在这片星域找到阴谋团的残党，我打算和他们谈谈。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「そして今こそ、指導者を失いコモラフの慈悲から見捨てられた陰謀団『略奪の嵐』に何が起きているのかを突き止めなければ。ううむ…生存者たちはリアルスペースに追い込まれ、セランスレッシュの餌食になってしまうだろう…{name}、連中を見つけるんだ。もしこの次元で陰謀団の生き残りの者たちと鉢合わせるようなことがあれば、話を聞きたいんだ」
languages.original_text: "And now it is time to learn what is happening with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, leaderless and abandoned to the mercies of Commorragh. Hmm... the survivors will probably be driven into realspace to fall prey to Sai'lanthresh... {name}, you must find them. If we encounter the remnants of the Kabal in this dimension, I will want to speak to them."

traits.locale_text: 「そして今こそ、指導者を失いコモラフの慈悲から見捨てられた陰謀団『略奪の嵐』に何が起きているのかを突き止めなければ。ううむ…生存者たちはリアルスペースに追い込まれ、セランスレッシュの餌食になってしまうだろう…{name}、連中を見つけるんだ。もしこの次元で陰謀団の生き残りの者たちと鉢合わせるようなことがあれば、話を聞きたいんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « L'heure est venue de découvrir ce qu'est devenue la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, depuis qu'elle a été privée de chef et abandonnée à la merci de Commorragh. Hmm... les survivants seront sans doute conduits dans l'espace réel pour être livrés en pâture à Sai'lanthresh... Vous devez les retrouver, {name}. Si nous croisons les derniers représentants de la Kabale dans cette dimension, j'aurai deux mots à leur dire. »
languages.original_text: "And now it is time to learn what is happening with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, leaderless and abandoned to the mercies of Commorragh. Hmm... the survivors will probably be driven into realspace to fall prey to Sai'lanthresh... {name}, you must find them. If we encounter the remnants of the Kabal in this dimension, I will want to speak to them."

traits.locale_text: « L'heure est venue de découvrir ce qu'est devenue la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, depuis qu'elle a été privée de chef et abandonnée à la merci de Commorragh. Hmm... les survivants seront sans doute conduits dans l'espace réel pour être livrés en pâture à Sai'lanthresh... Vous devez les retrouver, {name}. Si nous croisons les derniers représentants de la Kabale dans cette dimension, j'aurai deux mots à leur dire. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Und nun wird es Zeit, dass wir erfahren, was mit der Kabale des plündernden Sturms vor sich geht, führungslos und der Gnade von Commorragh ausgeliefert. Hmm ... die Überlebenden werden vermutlich in den Realraum getrieben, wo sie Sai'lanthresh zum Opfer fallen ... {name}, Ihr müsst sie finden. Wenn wir den Überresten der Kabale in dieser Dimension begegnen, werde ich mit ihnen sprechen wollen."
languages.original_text: "And now it is time to learn what is happening with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, leaderless and abandoned to the mercies of Commorragh. Hmm... the survivors will probably be driven into realspace to fall prey to Sai'lanthresh... {name}, you must find them. If we encounter the remnants of the Kabal in this dimension, I will want to speak to them."

traits.locale_text: "Und nun wird es Zeit, dass wir erfahren, was mit der Kabale des plündernden Sturms vor sich geht, führungslos und der Gnade von Commorragh ausgeliefert. Hmm ... die Überlebenden werden vermutlich in den Realraum getrieben, wo sie Sai'lanthresh zum Opfer fallen ... {name}, Ihr müsst sie finden. Wenn wir den Überresten der Kabale in dieser Dimension begegnen, werde ich mit ihnen sprechen wollen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "And now it is time to learn what is happening with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, leaderless and abandoned to the mercies of Commorragh. Hmm... the survivors will probably be driven into realspace to fall prey to Sai'lanthresh... , you must find them. If we encounter the remnants of the Kabal in this dimension, I will want to speak to them."

languages.text: "Şimdi de Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'nın akıbetini öğrenme vakti. Başlarında biri olmadan, Commorragh'ın insafına kalmış, ne yapıyorlar acaba? Hımm... Hayatta kalanlar, muhtemelen gerçekuzaya sürülmüştür. Sai'lanthresh'e yem olurlar... {name}, onları bulmalısın. Bu boyutta Kabal'dan arda kalanlara rastlayacak olursak konuşmak isterim."
languages.original_text: "And now it is time to learn what is happening with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest, leaderless and abandoned to the mercies of Commorragh. Hmm... the survivors will probably be driven into realspace to fall prey to Sai'lanthresh... {name}, you must find them. If we encounter the remnants of the Kabal in this dimension, I will want to speak to them."

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi de Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'nın akıbetini öğrenme vakti. Başlarında biri olmadan, Commorragh'ın insafına kalmış, ne yapıyorlar acaba? Hımm... Hayatta kalanlar, muhtemelen gerçekuzaya sürülmüştür. Sai'lanthresh'e yem olurlar... {name}, onları bulmalısın. Bu boyutta Kabal'dan arda kalanlara rastlayacak olursak konuşmak isterim."
